db:abstract.db:para: Provides a web browser engine as well as C++ classes to render and interact with web content.

db:article.db:para: Provides a web browser engine as well as C++ classes to render and interact with web content.

db:listitem.db:para: The QWebEngineCertificateError class provides information about a certificate error.
The QWebEngineContextMenuData class provides context data for populating or extending a context menu with actions.
The QWebEngineDownloadItem class provides information about a download.
The QWebEngineFullScreenRequest class enables accepting or rejecting requests for entering and exiting the fullscreen mode.
The QWebEngineHistory class represents the history of a web engine page.
The QWebEngineHistoryItem class represents one item in the history of a web engine page.
The QWebEnginePage class provides an object to view and edit web documents.
The QWebEngineProfile class provides a web engine profile shared by multiple pages.
The QWebEngineScript class encapsulates a JavaScript program.
The QWebEngineScriptCollection class represents a collection of user scripts.
The QWebEngineSettings class provides an object to store the settings used by QWebEnginePage.
The QWebEngineView class provides a widget that is used to view and edit web documents.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Qt WebEngineWidgets module provides a web browser engine as well as C++ classes to render and interact with web content.
